name: HENDERSON STRATEGIES ON BEHALF OF STRONGER AMERICA THROUGH SEAFOOD, INC.
description: Stronger America through Seafood, Inc. is an issue campaign focused on U.S. Seafood.
sampleDescriptions: Educate policymakers on the importance and many benefits of increasing U.S. production of sustainable, affordable and healthful seafood through aquaculture.
